name: Kurukuru Twinkle: Onegaioho Shisama
overview: Kurukuru Twinkle: Onegaioho Shisama is a puzzle game in which the player can choose between two characters a male and a female one and in which the gameplay is to put together three pieces of the same kind. The game features cute 2d character, a fine and challenging gameplay (the difficulty is increasing with the increasing game levels) and even a 2 players vs mode.
